about.text_2: Converrcy is a React project created by Vitor Rodrigues. It serves as an online currency converter, designed to provide users with real-time exchange rates for up to 32 different currencies. Whether you're traveling, managing your finances, or simply curious about exchange rates, Converrcy offers a reliable and easy-to-use solution.
